message.body: Could you get me some marlboros that I'll pay you back for
Sure. What kind? Also, when am I supposed to see you?
Uhh idk the best kind? I don't know the kinds. I just like marlboro. I trust your judgement. Idk I guess we juss gonna hafta ~hang out soon~ :P
This is just a way of trying to get me to hang out with you but yea sure. We'll figure something out.
